page.enlisting:
● A Neutrino Factory would provide a new type of neutrino beam, made from muon decays (c.f. charged pion decays for conventional neutrino beams. ● Since muons live 100 longer than charged pions, to be efficient a linear muon decay channel would have to be tens of km long, hence: ● A Neutrino Factory would provide a new type of neutrino beam, made from muon decays (c.f. charged pion decays for conventional neutrino beams.

cell.tabletext:
4 MW Proton Source
4 MW
Proton
Source

page.enlisting:
• Proton Source – Beam power  4MW – E  few GeV – Short bunches ( 3ns) • Target, capture & decay – Create p, decay into m  • Bunching & Phase Rotation – Capture into bunches – Reduce DE • Cooling (cost effective but not mandatory) – Use Ionization Cooling to reduce transverse emittance to fit within an accelerator • Proton Source
